main event: A multi-colored object the size of a grapefruit was observed in Indianapolis, Indiana, on 22 September 1959.
interesting points: The object appeared stationary at an elevation of 25 degrees., The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 15 minutes., Mars was low in the sky during the observation, resembling a star or planet., A separate observation on 23 September 1958 noted a round white light moving at high speed., The object made no sound during the second sighting.
sighted object: multi-colored object, size of a grapefruit
